name: Spently

description: A smarter way to send receipts.
overview:
Spently makes it easy for merchants to send beautiful and effective email receipts that increase customer engagement and drive sales.

Spently’s web-based software helps merchants plan, create, and deliver content to individual customers. Using new online transactional touchpoints, such as receipts, or order confirmation emails, Spently is re-inventing the receipt in ways no one has done before. An email receipt can now be used to deliver promotional messages, logos, disclaimers, and geographic-based information, all while providing new insights to merchants.

Spently’s electronic receipts have proven to be a key feature that complements the evolving e-commerce and point-of-sale markets by adding a highly effective and newly discovered opportunity for email marketing and customer intelligence.

Spently was founded in 2011 when founders submitted their business plan to a college-wide competition and won, becoming recipients of the Humber Venture Fund. Since then, the company has gone on to raise additional funding, assemble a great team, launch a product, and take on initial customers.
